item.description: Total stellar mass of galaxy
item.label: Total Stellar Mass

item.description: Stellar mass in the bulge component of the galaxy
item.label: Bulge Stellar Mass

item.description: Mass of the black hole
item.label: Black Hole Mass

item.description: Cold gas mass of the galaxy
item.label: Cold Gas Mass

item.description: Hot gas mass of the galaxy
item.label: Hot Gas Mass

item.description: Mass of gas ejected from both the galaxy and the halo
item.label: Ejected Gas Mass

item.description: Stellar mass in the intracluster stars
item.label: Intracluster Stars Mass

item.description: Mass of metals in the galaxy stars (bulge + disk)
item.label: Metals Total Stellar Mass

item.description: Mass of metals in the bulge stars
item.label: Metals Bulge Mass

item.description: Mass of metals in the cold gas phase
item.label: Metals Cold Gas Mass

item.description: Mass of metals in the hot gas phase
item.label: Metals Hot Gas Mass

item.description: Mass of metals in the gas ejected from the galaxy
item.label: Metals Ejected Gas Mass

item.description: Mass of metals in the intracluster stars
item.label: Metals IntraCluster Stars Mass

item.description: Galaxy type: 0-central, 1-satellite
item.label: Galaxy Classification

item.description: Scale radius of the stellar disk
item.label: Disk Scale Radius

item.description: Total star formation rate, (includes both disk and bulge components)
item.label: Total Star Formation Rate

item.description: Hot halo gas cooling rate
item.label: Hot Gas Cooling Rate

item.description: AGN Heating Rate
item.label: AGN Heating Rate

item.description: The mass accreted onto the black hole in the quasar mode across the current simulation time step.
item.label: Quasar BH Accretion Mass

item.description: Time of last major merger
item.label: Time of Last Major Merger

item.description: Time of last minor merger
item.label: Time of Last Minor Merger

item.description: Cold gas outflow rate from supernovae
item.label: Supernova Cold Gas Outflow Rate

item.description: Virial mass of the (sub)halo
item.label: Mvir

item.description: Physical virial radius of the (sub)halo
item.label: Rvir

item.description: Virial velocity of the (sub)halo
item.label: Vvir

item.description: Maximum circular velocity of the (sub)halo
item.label: Vmax

item.description: Velocity dispersion of the (sub)halo
item.label: Velocity Dispersion

item.description: X-component of specific angular momentum. Defined as Spin[3] := 1/N \sum_{i=1}^{N} (r_i - rcen) \cross (v_i - vcen), where r_i is the physical position of the i'th particle, rcen is the position of the center of mass, v_i is the peculiar velocity of the particle and vcen is the bulk velocity of the halo
item.label: X Spin

item.description: Y-component of specific angular momentum. Defined as Spin[3] := 1/N \sum_{i=1}^{N} (r_i - rcen) \cross (v_i - vcen), where r_i is the physical position of the i'th particle, rcen is the position of the center of mass, v_i is the peculiar velocity of the particle and vcen is the bulk velocity of the halo
item.label: Y Spin

item.description: Z-component of specific angular momentum. Defined as Spin[3] := 1/N \sum_{i=1}^{N} (r_i - rcen) \cross (v_i - vcen), where r_i is the physical position of the i'th particle, rcen is the position of the center of mass, v_i is the peculiar velocity of the particle and vcen is the bulk velocity of the halo
item.label: Z Spin

item.description: Total number of simulation particles in the dark matter halo
item.label: Total Particles

item.description: Virial mass of the central galaxy halo
item.label: Central Galaxy Mvir

item.description: Subhalo Mvir at infall
item.label: Subhalo Mvir at Infall

item.description: Virial velocity of the (sub)halo at infall
item.label: Subhalo Vvir at Infall

item.description: Maximum circular velocity of the (sub)halo at infall
item.label: Subhalo Vmax at Infall

item.description: Maximum circular velocity attained in the assembly history (susceptible to spikes during mergers, see Vrelax for a better property)
item.label: Maximum circular velocity of the halo

item.description: 1-is a flyby halo, 0-normal halo
item.label: Flyby Flag

item.description: Co-moving X position of the (sub)halo
item.label: X

item.description: Co-moving Y position of the (sub)halo
item.label: Y

item.description: Co-moving Z position of the (sub)halo
item.label: Z

item.description: X component of the galaxy/halo velocity
item.label: X Velocity

item.description: Y component of the galaxy/halo velocity
item.label: Y Velocity

item.description: Z component of the galaxy/halo velocity
item.label: Z Velocity

item.description: Snapshot number in the simulation
item.label: Snapshot Number

item.description: An unique ID that stays with the galaxy/halo for its entire history
item.label: Galaxy ID

item.description: The unique Galaxy ID of the central galaxy this galaxy/halo belongs to
item.label: Central Galaxy ID

item.description: An ID for the (sub)halo passed through from the original simulation
item.label: Simulation Halo ID
Maximum circular velocity of the halo
